title: President condoles death of Mian Amer Mahmoodâ€™s sister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Thursday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the demise of sister of Dunya News Network Chairman Mian Amer Mahmood.
Extending his condolences to Mian Amer Mahmood, the president prayed for the elevation of ranks of the departed soul in Jannah and for the grant of strength to the bereaved family to bear the loss with patience.
In a statement, the president said he stood with the bereaved family in this hour of grief and sorrow.
